cohort: ER+/HER2- MBC, 2L, Site B, by Regimen (2024–2025)
summary: At Site B, all CDK4/6 inhibitors are underutilized, with palbociclib at just 28%. Increasing utilization across regimens could yield $45,000/year.

clinical_impact.description: Improving CDK4/6i utilization at Site B increases survival.

action_steps: Provide targeted education to Site B clinicians
Review Site B's workflow for CDK4/6i eligibility
Implement Site B-specific CDK4/6i clinical pathway
suggestions: Share best practices from other sites with Site B

drilldowns.label: By Provider
drilldowns.cohort: ER+/HER2- MBC, 2L, Site B, by Provider
